name: Gearbits: Raider Expedition
storyline: The giant insects menacing Ourant have been exterminated and peace has returned to the planet. With no more bugs to fear, raiders and salvagers are racing to the remote regions of the planet to reclaim any scrap and valuables left behind when the bugs attacked. A small crew of salvagers makes an usual discovery, when they find the sentient navigational computer of a crashed spaceship. The computer awakens and asks the crew for help in locating valuable parts of the crashed ship. Aided by the computer, the crew embarks on a quest that takes them to the remote regions of the planet, where they must fight a group of suspiciously well armed mercenaries and the mysteriously re-emerging giant insects.
summary: Gearbits: Raider expedition is an expansion campaign for Gearbits. The campaign is a side-story, taking place after the end of Gearbits. The expansion features new missions and maps. A new cast of characters and new playable units.
